translated: The Group of Discourses🔽The Chapter on the Firm One Bowed
The Assaka Birth Story🔽“This country was roamed by me,
by the king of the Assakas;
By one who was desirous of favour,
By the new happiness and suffering,
Therefore, even more than the king of the Assakas,
the insect is dear to me.”🔽The Assaka Birth Story is the seventh.
